page.title: 03FARM ACCOUNTS PART(1)
page.content:
Mr. Barnes is a{smallholder}in this area with seasonal flocks of{1000 {turkeys}and{1000 chickens.}(Christmas) His everyday occupation is {agricultural contracting}and includes {ploughing}for local farmers and the {mowing}of cricket and football pitches. Here are pages of accounts from a {smallholder poultry expenditure}for the month of{December 1983.
GROSS NET VAT {_____ ___ ___ { 1st}BRITISH 36.40 31.66 4.74 TELECOM (Tel.Bill) { 4th}ROLPHS 191.50 191.50 (Poultry Feed) { 6th}GORNALLS 2143.00 2143.00 (10-20lb Turkeys) { 6th}GENERAL 138.00 138.00 ACCIDENT(Car Ins.)
